subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gerald Wallace had 27 points and 11 rebounds, Adam Morrison hit the go-ahead 3-pointer in overtime and the Charlotte Bobcats beat visiting Cleveland, 108-100, last night to snap the Cavaliers’ eight-game winning streak.
snippet: Gerald Wallace had 27 points and 11 rebounds, Adam Morrison hit the go-ahead 3-pointer in overtime and the Charlotte Bobcats beat visiting Cleveland, 108-100, last night to snap the Cavaliers’ eight-game winning streak.
